item.title: Nooby question but plz look
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

i really am pissed off right now!!! i added the darn shop right and everything, but it doesnt want to work, it just freezes when i try to open up the shop okay, here are my steps:

first i opened autospawn.cfg and added these npc

spawn = 208	3118	9853	0	3116	9855	3114	9853	2	Shop keeper 2 at hill giants //start of hill

then i added this in npcHandler.java:

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 208) { //shop keeper2 at hill giants
						if (misc.random2(30) == 1) {
							npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "If you need food, this is where you get it!";
						}
					}

and then i went to shops.cfg and added this:

shop = 44	Food Shop					1	1	7946	50000	385	50000	397	50000

alright, so now, i added the wanneshop:

else if (NPCID == 208) { // food shop at hillies
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 44;
}

then, i logged in, traded the npc, and it didnt work!! it just freezes, i fixed some stuff such as it now opens the freakin shop menu but no further… so, can someone tell me where i went wrong?? this is pissing me off!!

plz tell me if it works on your server… okay, so, please help me ill be waiting…

rep++ for anyone who figures this out. ive been coding for a while now and this just has me stumped, omg ty for the help for anyone who tries alright, here we go!

Read full topic
